description:
GeForce NOW connects to digital PC game stores so you can stream the library of games you already own

GeForce NOW instantly transforms nearly any laptop, desktop, Mac, SHIELD TV, Android device, iPhone, or iPad into the PC gaming rig youâ€™ve always dreamed of.
Play the most demanding PC games and seamlessly play across your devices.
Improved support for Windows on Arm laptops
- Added support for up to 4K resolution, 120 FPS and HDR when streaming GeForce NOW on Arm-based laptops through the Prism emulation engine. GeForce NOW support for Windows on Arm laptops is currently in Beta. For the best experience, NVIDIA recommends that you download the GeForce NOW Windows app and disable the Windows Dynamic Refresh Rate feature on these laptops.

Bug Fixes
- General stability and performance improvements.

Whatcha Thinking?
- Tell us about your streaming session, or what games you want to play, or suggested improvements we can make. Use that exclamation icon to send feedback in the app and let us know what you think.
